transcript.content: Good afternoon. LAMA GP surgery. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I need assistance with follow-up for previous consultation.
Can you confirm your name and date of birth for identity verification?
My name is Jennifer Mcclure and I was born on October 18, 1999.
Thank you, Jennifer Mcclure. I've located your records. Let me assist you with your request.
Sure, what options do I have?
For your follow-up for previous consultation, we can schedule a routine appointment. Does next week work for you?
I have a slot available on Monday at 11 AM with Dr. Lee. Does that work?
You're now booked with Dr. Lee on Monday at 11 AM. See you then!
